content: The HL7 STU Comments are not moved to JIRA?

There shouldn't be any STU comments captured there for anything FHIR. That's not an accepted feedback mechanism for FHIR artifacts. Doing a quick scan, I don't see any FHIR artifacts that have feedback there. @Lynn Laakso, is there any way to ensure that FHIR IG STUs aren't even shown on that site?
Looks like CQL does have comments. @Bryn Rhodes, you should figure out what you want to do with those.
If I suppress the STU comments I might also suppress the link to the STU which holds the URL of the standard...
@Lloyd McKenzie I was referring to CQL Comments. I should have mentioned it.
@Lloyd McKenzie , I'd be happy to move the CQL STU comments to JIRA. Is there some process already established for importing the results of an STU comment export?
Nope. And there's a ton of metadata you'd need to add before the imports would be treated as valid (e.g. what spec, what work group, type of comment, what artifact/page, etc.
